SEARCH

Class AppointmentServiceFacade

java.lang.Object
AppointmentServiceFacade
public class AppointmentServiceFacade extends Object
The `AppointmentServiceFacade` class provides a simplified interface for managing appointments, doctor availabilities, and patient data. It integrates multiple services, including `DoctorService`, `PatientService`, `AppointmentService`, and `PrescriptionService`, and follows the Singleton design pattern.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AppointmentServiceFacade getInstance(String patientFilePath, String staffFilePath)
      Retrieves the Singleton instance of the `AppointmentServiceFacade`, initializing it with file paths if it has not been created yet.
      Parameters:
      patientFilePath - The file path to the patient data.
      staffFilePath - The file path to the staff data.
      Returns:
      The Singleton instance of `AppointmentServiceFacade`.

    • getDoctorAvailability

      public DoctorAvailability getDoctorAvailability(String doctorId)
      Retrieves the availability of a specific doctor by their ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor.
      Returns:
      The availability of the specified doctor.

    • getAllDoctorAvailabilities

      public List<DoctorAvailability> getAllDoctorAvailabilities()
      Retrieves the availability of all doctors.
      Returns:

      Prints the availability of all doctors to the console.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public void scheduleAppointment(Patient patient, String doctorId, LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Schedules an appointment for a specific patient and doctor.
      Parameters:
      patient - The patient for whom the appointment is being scheduled.
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor for the appointment.
      dateTime - The date and time of the appointment.

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment(String appointmentId)
      Cancels an existing appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to cancel.

    • processAppointment

      public void processAppointment(String appointmentId, boolean accept)
      Processes an appointment by confirming or declining it.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to process.
      accept - `true` to confirm the appointment, `false` to decline.

      public boolean updatePrescriptionStatus(String appointmentId, Medicine medicine, PrescriptionStatus status)
      Updates the status of a prescription associated with an appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment.
      medicine - The medicine associated with the prescription.
      status - The new status to set.
      Returns:
      `true` if the status was successfully updated, `false` otherwise.

      Returns:

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public boolean rescheduleAppointment(String appointmentID, LocalDateTime newDateTime)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new date and time.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to reschedule.
      newDateTime - The new date and time for the appointment.
      Returns:
      `true` if the rescheduling was successful, `false` otherwise.
